text: kushaadgi waale ko apni kushaadgi se qarch karna chahiye aur jis par us ke rizq ki tangi ki gayi ho, ose chahiye ke jo kuch Allah taâ€™ala ne ose de rakha hai, osi mein se (apni hazbe haysiyath) de, kisi shaqs ko Allah takleef nahi deta, magar utni hee jitni taaqath ose de rakhi hai, Allah tangi ke baadh asaani wa faraaghath bhi kar dega
